<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Priest](/NPCs.aspx?ID=896)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Cloistered priests safeguard their temples and communities. They are the stalwart keepers of their god's tenets, devoted to spreading the word. Their guidance or healing services come at the cost of a donation.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Devotee_Priest.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Priest of Pharasma](/NPCs.aspx?ID=896)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 213</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +12, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +14, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 dagger_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 80

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 24, attack +16
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Disrupting Weapons](/Spells.aspx?ID=80), [Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195), [Spirit Link](/Spells.aspx?ID=302)
- **2nd**
[Gentle Repose](/Spells.aspx?ID=131), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
- **3rd**
[Circle of Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=38), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (x3), [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269) (x2)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 24, 1 Focus Point
- **3rd**
[Death's Call](/Spells.aspx?ID=413)

**Divine Rituals** DC 24

- **2nd**
[Consecrate](/Rituals.aspx?ID=8)

**Healing Hands**   When the priest casts heal, they roll d10s instead of d8s.

**Steady Spellcasting**   If another creature's reaction would disrupt the priest's spellcasting action, the priest attempts a DC 15 flat check. If the priest succeeds, their action isn't disrupted.

</column>
